description: Retrieves information about the status and settings of the voice channel for an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. This identifier is displayed as the Project ID on the Amazon Pinpoint console.

nested_items.name: VoiceChannelResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about the status and settings of the voice channel for an application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the application that the voice channel applies to.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 format, when the voice channel was enabled.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the voice channel is enabled for the application.

nested_items.name: HasCredential
nested_items.description: (Not used) This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: (Deprecated) An identifier for the voice channel. This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: IsArchived
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the voice channel is archived.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last modified the voice channel.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 format, when the voice channel was last modified.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The type of messaging or notification platform for the channel. For the voice channel, this value is VOICE.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The current version of the voice channel.
